io.inbound: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="EUC-KR"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:p="http://schemas.ibk.com/mms/io/"> <xs:complexType name="MAPBS0123126_inbound"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="EDPS_CSN"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>전산고객번호</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption /> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:LONG"> <xs:totalDigits value="10" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BRCD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>부점코드</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption /> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:STRING"> <xs:maxLength value="4" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CSMN_TEAM_CD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>고객관리팀코드</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption /> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:STRING"> <xs:maxLength value="2" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
io.outbound: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="EUC-KR"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:p="http://schemas.ibk.com/mms/io/"> <xs:complexType name="MAPBS0123126_outbound"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ALCT_EMN"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>배정직원번호</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption /> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:STRING"> <xs:maxLength value="6" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ALCT_EMM"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>배정직원명</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption /> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:STRING"> <xs:maxLength value="50" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
